titles.title: Protecting Seniors' Access to Doctors Act of 2010
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to ensure continued access to Medicare for seniors and people with disabilities and to TRICARE for America's military families.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/18/2010--Introduced. Protecting Seniors' Access to Doctors Act of 2010 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to set at 1% from December 1, 2010, through December 31, 2011, the update to the single conversion factor in the formula for determining the physician fee payment schedule.
